Representations and Formats
===========================

(This part could e.g. feature (algorithmic) composition exercises)

Scores
------

MIDI
~~~~

humdrum \*\*kern
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

XML Scores
~~~~~~~~~~

- MEI
- MusicXML
- MuseScore XML

music21
~~~~~~~

Chords
------

(symbolic)

- Harte
- ABC
- \*\*harm
- RomanText
- ...
